cluster_relations.rel_desc: Participation in sports helps individuals develop perseverance.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject activity or domain (e.g., participation in sports, sports) causally promotes the development or acquisition of the object skills, traits, or lessons in participants.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Life Skills and Lessons from Sports

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Athletes collaborate and direct their efforts toward a shared common goal.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an agent directs effort toward achieving a specified goal.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Sports provide lessons such as cooperation and dealing with success and failure.
